short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Salesforce Recent Components For Salesforce Developers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Salesforce Simplified is a Chrome extension designed for Salesforce and Omnistudio developers/administrators to enhance their productivity by making useful data points easily accessible directly from the UI.

When working on any module, having your recently created or modified data readily available allows you to work faster and save time by avoiding unnecessary clicks. With the advanced search feature of Salesforce Simplified, you can access your code with just a few clicks.

Key features include quick access to:

- Debug logs
- Classes
- Pages
- Components
- Triggers
- Objects
- Fields
- Labels
- Workflows
- Flows
- Email Templates
- Static Resources

For Vlocity/Omnistudio, it provides access to:

- Omniscript
- Dataraptor
- Cards
- Templates
- Actions
- Products

Additionally, it supports access to key Salesforce entities such as:

- Opportunities
- Quotes
- Orders
- Accounts
- Contacts
- Cases
- Leads
- Campaigns

This extension is designed to streamline your workflow, making it easier to manage and access critical information.
